author: kkolinko
msg: Allow to have several AccessLogValve instances in the same scope (e.g. in the same Context).

author: jbellis
msg: add sanity check of row data size

author: kkolinko
msg: Split "condition" attribute of AccessLogValve into two, "conditionIf" and "conditionUnless".
Implement conditional logging that logs only if a request attribute is present.
The old attribute "condition" is provided as well, for backwards compatibility, and is equal to "conditionUnless".

author: djencks
msg: OWB-582 Also don't replace a service provided in initial services
